definition: to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The man was pinned down by a fallen tree.
sentences.chinese: 那人被一棵倒下的树压住了。

sentences.english: The fallen tree has bridged the two porches.
sentences.chinese: 那棵倒下的树木把两个门廊连接起来了。

sentences.english: "Marathoners run until they fall down, " she said.
sentences.chinese: “马拉松运动员就是跑到倒下为止，”她说。

sentences.english: In the scenes in which it topples, he is not.
sentences.chinese: 在它倒下的画面里，他却没戴。

sentences.english: Isn't there another reason why elephants can't fall down?
sentences.chinese: 有没有别种原因让象不能倒下？

sentences.english: Coach a hand, the children will go down.
sentences.chinese: 教练一出手，孩子便应声倒下。

sentences.english: Life is like riding a bicycle: you don't fall off unless you stop pedaling.
sentences.chinese: 生活就像骑行，要想不倒下，就不要停止蹬踏。

sentences.english: Long day back cover of the accused, said he "will not fall."
sentences.chinese: 隆盖当天反击这一指责，称自己“不会倒下”。
爱尔兰是第二个倒下的。

sentences.english: Out of the eight men who fell in the fight , only three still breathed .
sentences.chinese: 这场战斗中倒下的八个人中有三个还没咽气。

sentences.english: They had sawn up the fallen tree, so they had a good store of firewood.
sentences.chinese: 他们把那棵倒下的树锯断了，因此贮存了丰富的柴火。

sentences.english: She fell dead upon the spot, without a groan.
sentences.chinese: 她当场就倒下了，连一声呻吟都没有。

sentences.english: - When a Treant falls in the forest, does it make a sound?
sentences.chinese: 一个树人在森林里倒下时，会发出声音吗？

sentences.english: The flagpole toppled over and a crane had to be used to erect it.
sentences.chinese: 旗杆倒下了，必须用起重机将它扶直。
直到呯的一声倒下说拜拜。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, a fallen cart, pressure on the year. there.
sentences.chinese: 只可惜，一辆倒下的拉货车，压在了王富贵的身上。

definition: to meet violent death/to get killed
to tumble/to fall/fig. to suffer a reverse (in politics or business)
loudly/with a loud bang/a loud rumble
to be hit by a gun/shot
